department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: flat, circular crown; padded side with ear covers; black chin cord; blue yarn and green and red cord fringe around crown embelished with multicolored ball and spiral beads; bands of applique and ribbon on crown and around sides; yarn top tassel in blue, green and yellow
dimension: 5 1/2 x 8 1/4 x 8 1/4 in. (13.97 x 20.96 x 20.96 cm) (without top tassel)
title: Hat, from a three-piece set
